title: Chapter 1220 - A Fleeting Shadow
body:
Chapter 1220 - A Fleeting Shadow

During his lifetime as the Temple Master, he searched bitterly for a path beyond that of Heaven’s Ascension.

Furthermore, he’d even brushed up against its doorway!

Alas, due to flaws he’d left when proving his Dao and becoming a World King, he ultimately failed to cross the threshold into this higher path. 

Was the Temple Master not strong enough?

That wasn’t it at all.

The way Su Yi saw it, his situation was most likely similar to what he’d faced here in the Dark and Gold Star Realm. For some unknown reason, that higher path had long since ceased to exist in this world.

Or perhaps... that higher path was restricted in some way.

In that case, even if the Temple Master’s cultivation had been far more heaven-defying than it already was, how could he possibly advance any further?

The gate was locked, or perhaps moved altogether, so how could he enter it?

Venerate Flooding Heavens’ misfortune, combined with Qin Chongxu’s power when he crossed the River of Time, made Su Yi certain of something.

The Path of Heaven’s Ascension really wasn’t the endpoint of the Grand Dao.

A higher path existed above it!

Rumors...
